General.Name: Fushun Special Steel Co Ltd
General.Description: Fushun Special Steel Co.,LTD. manufactures and sells steel products in China and internationally. The company offers super alloy, tool and die steel, stainless steel, titanium alloy, alloy structural steel, and bearing steel products. Its products are used in the aviation, aerospace, weapons, nuclear power, petroleum and petrochemical, transportation, engineering machinery, medical, and other industries. The company also exports its products to various countries. Fushun Special Steel Co.,LTD. was founded in 1937 and is based in Fushun, China.
General.Address: No.8, East Anshan Road, Fushun, China
